biotools.summary: Software for analysis of residual dipolar couplings. Its main component is the Prediction of ALignmEnt from Structure simulation that predicts the magnitude and orientation of a sterically induced alignment tensor from a solute’s (protein/nucleic acid/oligosaccharide) three-dimensional shape.

bioschemas.name: PALES
bioschemas.summary: Software for analysis of residual dipolar couplings. Its main component is the Prediction of ALignmEnt from Structure simulation that predicts the magnitude and orientation of a sterically induced alignment tensor from a solute’s (protein/nucleic acid/oligosaccharide) three-dimensional shape.
